page.title: 05LIFE IN FREELAND
page.content:
Jonathan is aged 10. There are four people in his family and he has one brother. He lives in Bornmarsh Lane near the school, and he walks to school. He goes to a lot of places in the car. His mum shops in Witney.
He collects stamps and plays football. His hobby is judo and he does it in school. He has a BMX bike but there is no BMX track in Freeland. He likes living in Freeland.
His teacher is Miss Johnson and his favourite subject is maths. He goes out to play in school time at half past ten and after dinner. School finishes at a quarter past three.
